about_the_game:
About the Game

Welcome to Animals, a dynamic clicker game where your clicks matter! Collect unique animals and grow your collection as you explore different habitats.

Why Play Animals?

• Interactive and Engaging: Your efforts directly impact your rewards. The more you play, the more you earn!
• Community Driven: Our game evolves with input from our community. Join us and have your say in the game’s development.
• Strategic Clicking: With varied habitats and adaptive drop rates, each play session offers new strategies and challenges.

Gameplay:

• Active Clicking: The more you click, the better your chances of receiving rare and legendary items.
• Animal Habitats: Explore four distinct verticals - Aerial, Arboreal, Terrestrial, and Aquatic. Each habitat offers unique animals and influences your click strategy.
• Adaptive Drop Rates: Your drop chances are influenced by the avatar and habitat you’re exploring. Each vertical has its own drop rates for rare and legendary items. And of course, you'll recieve an animal from your active avatar's habitat.
• Your Active Avatar: You can select any of your animal avatars from the inventory to click on, each group has their boosts and attributes. But be careful when selling them, as if you only have 1, you won't be able to click on it. You will still be receiving drops, but wasting the ability to increase your chances by session + today + history clicks.

Features:

• Animal Collection: Discover and collect a variety of animals, each with its own unique traits.
• Boosts and Enhancements: Rare and legendary items provide significant boosts to your clicks per second (CPS), increasing your chances of finding more valuable items.
• Regular Drops: Receive a common avatar drop almost every 3 hours (2.5h to be accurate, where chances from 80% to 100% depending on the rarity of your active animal avatar), and a rare or legendary item drop every 3 hours, with chances affected by your clicking activity. Take into account you'll receive animal drops from your active avatar habitat.
• Community Integration: Submit your animal designs via Discord and see them come to life in the game! Join our vibrant community and contribute to the game’s evolution.

Community Driven:

• Collaborative Creation: We are in constant contact with our community, and our vision is to have players design new inventory items and animals. Your creations could be the next big hit in the game!
• Building a Metaverse: Our goal is to create a larger metaverse. Animals is just the beginning. Future games, like a Tycoon game, will allow you to use your collected avatars, maintaining continuity and adding depth to your gaming experience.


Join us in Animals and see how your clicks can lead to an extraordinary collection of animals!
Join our Discord!

  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel i3 5500 / AMD Ryzen 3 4800X / AMD A4 4000
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM

short_description: Animals is an engaging clicker game where every click counts. Explore unique habitats like Aerial, Arboreal, Terrestrial, and Aquatic, and collect diverse animals. Earn regular and rare drops influenced by your click activity. Join our community to help shape the game and build a vast metaverse.
